code: import React,{Component}from'react';import{Form,Icon,Message,Button}from'semantic-ui-react';import StatusMessage from'../../components/statusmessage';import'./styles.css';export default class Login extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.handleChange=(e,{name,value})=>{this.setState({[name]:value});};this.isFormValid=()=>{const _this$state=this.state,username=_this$state.username,password=_this$state.password;let isFormValid=true;if(!username||!password){isFormValid=false;}return isFormValid;};this.handleSubmit=e=>{if(this.isFormValid()){this.props.handleLogin(this.state.username,this.state.password);}};this.state={username:'',password:''};}render(){let _this$props=this.props,isLoading=_this$props.isLoading,error=_this$props.error,showRegister=_this$props.showRegister;const statusMessage=React.createElement(StatusMessage,{error:error,errorMessage:error||'Login Error',loading:isLoading,loadingMessage:'Signing in',type:"modal"});return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement(Message,{attached:true,header:"Login"}),statusMessage,React.createElement(Form,{className:"attached fluid segment"},React.createElement(Form.Input,{required:true,label:"Username",placeholder:"Username",type:"text",name:"username",value:this.state.username,onChange:this.handleChange}),React.createElement(Form.Input,{required:true,label:"Password",type:"password",name:"password",value:this.state.password,onChange:this.handleChange}),React.createElement(Button,{color:"blue",loading:isLoading,disabled:isLoading,onClick:this.handleSubmit},"Login")),React.createElement(Message,{attached:"bottom",warning:true},React.createElement(Icon,{name:"help"}),"New to this site?\xA0",React.createElement("a",{className:"login-register",onClick:showRegister},"Register here"),"\xA0instead."));}}
